data.message:
Mark why don't you do something about this??? 
Heads-up!! Almost every account is being cloned. Your picture and your name are used to create a new face book account (they don't need your password to do this this). They want your friends to add them to their Facebook account. Your friends will think that it's you and accept your request. From that point on they can write what they want under your name. I have NO plans to open a new account. Please DO NOT accept a 2nd friend request from "me". please forward to all your contacts

replies.message: Hey Robin. Our team is aware of this hoax campaign. You can disregard the message. Thanks for checking in with us! -Elizabeth
But it's not a hoax because I've seen FB requests sent on my account right before my eyes that i did not send.  It's happening to everyone!  This is no hoax
It's been going on for years.  When I first heard about it I didn't believe it but then it started happening to me.

Facebook took all my photos & disabled my account. Ive lost contacts around the world & pictures of all my travels. Im not happy about the way i look & dont feel well having pictures taken of me. They claimed im up to suspicious activity. Ive contacted them back multiple times & the just simply ignore me.
Hello?  What is FB doing about this!!!!   I have a hundred friends that have also been impacted.  You guys need to do something this is bull crap.
